channel.title: Changing 3 Things In the Server Help!
channel.description:
Hey Guys Just Got Three Questions Im Stuck On :s
1: When I change The Exp Rate On My Server its not Working (317 Server) 2: How Do I change the starter wear in what file 3: What File Do I change the bonus Points On a Ring Or Armour
Thank You :P

item.title: Changing 3 Things In the Server Help!
item.dc:creator: @staypuff staypuff
item.description:
@staypuff wrote:

Sometimes #2 is in client.java (serverside) I know mine is.

Read full topic
item.source: Changing 3 Things In the Server Help!

item.description:
@zane_x wrote:

Thank You Everyone I appreciate it

Read full topic

item.title: Changing 3 Things In the Server Help!
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

Combat:

inCombat(); if (FightType == 1) // Accurate { TotalExp = (double) (300 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerAttack); } else if (FightType == 2) // Agressive { TotalExp = (double) (300 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerStrength); } else if (FightType == 4) // Defensive { TotalExp = (double) (300 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerDefence); } else if (FightType == 3) // Controlled { TotalExp = (double) (300 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerStrength); }
2. Player.java
3. item.cfg

Read full topic
item.source: Changing 3 Things In the Server Help!

@jose3121 wrote:

item.title: Changing 3 Things In the Server Help!
item.dc:creator: @mrjad mrjad
item.description:
@mrjad wrote:

heres your answer for 3, go into item.cfg, search for the ring or wtv you want to change the stats of, it will look something like this

item = (itemid) Item_name This_is_the_examine. buyprice sellprice alchprice attstat attstat attstat attstat attstat defstat defstat defstat defstat defstat str bonus prayerbonus

Read full topic
item.source: Changing 3 Things In the Server Help!
